basics.name: MUHAMMAD UMAIR KHAN
basics.label: Automation Engineer
basics.x_title: Leading the Industry with Innovative Automation Solutions
basics.summary: Expertly designing and implementing automated solutions for optimal efficiency and productivity. Continuously pushing boundaries with the latest technology and industry trends.

work.summary: Implemented IRawFragment Provider in the backend using .NET Core and built a Test Automation Framework for Desktop Automation using Appium, C# & Microsoft WinAppDriver. Automated smoke and regression cases of a web-based application using Playwright and integrated CI/CD. Led the QA Automation team and monitored task assignments, while participating in resource hiring.

Analyzed business requirements and functional design specifications to ensure all needs were met. Performed manual testing and automated the smoke tests of a web-based application using Selenium Web driver and Python. My automation efforts not only helped to check the high-level functional stability of the application, but also streamlined the regression process with CI/CD, reducing company resources and increasing confidence in release patches for a web-based application..

Developed and maintained web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked closely with UX/UI designers to implement responsive designs and improve user experience. Built reusable and scalable components for the front-end. Utilized JavaScript frameworks such as React and AngularJS to build dynamic user interfaces. Implemented cross-browser compatibility and ensured optimal performance of web applications.

Developed and maintained native Android applications using Java and Android Studio. Utilized XML for designing user interface, layouts and animations. Implemented various Android libraries and APIs to enhance the functionality of the application. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement innovative solutions for user experience. Worked closely with designers to create custom user interfaces and animations to meet client requirements.

Conducted manual testing of various applications to ensure functionality and compatibility. Performed black box and white box testing to validate the system against user requirements. Discovered and reported software bugs and issues, and collaborated with development team to ensure resolution. Documented and maintained test plans, test cases, and bug reports. Contributed to the development of testing strategies and techniques to improve overall quality assurance processes.
